text: Roberto Mancinelli (born 29 January 1976 in Albano Laziale, Italy) is an Italian footballer. He plays as a goalkeeper. He is currently playing for Italian Lega Pro Prima Divisione team Benevento. In July 2011 he was signed by Benevento in 1-year contract. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:People from Albano Laziale Category:Italian footballers Category:S.S. title: Roberto Mancinelli
